t: Watch Just Go With It | Prime Video
s: Danny (Adam Sandler) is a successful plastic surgeon who pretends to be unhappily married to get women. When he finally meets a girl (Brooklyn Decker) he believes to be the woman of his dreams, he doesn't use his method on her, but she soon finds the wedding band he uses.

t: Amazon Go convenience stores are headed to suburbia | Grocery Dive
s: January 25, 2022 - This isn't the first time Amazon has launched a new format under the Go brand. The company opened two Go Grocery stores in the Seattle area in 2020 but phased out the brand just over a year later, underscoring its intention to focus on Go and Fresh stores moving forward.

t: Eliminate checkout lines. Increase revenue with cost-optimized technology - AWS Just Walk Out
s: More than 145 third-party retailers are leveraging Just Walk Out technology at locations across the U.S., UK, Australia, and Canada with new locations launching every month · © 2024, Amazon, Inc. or its affiliates. All rights reserved

t: Amazon Go stores: How the 'Just walk out' cashierless tech works
s: June 21, 2024 - There are two types of Amazon stores that offer the "just walk out" technology. The first type is an Amazon Go that is more like a convenience store. These stores offer breakfast, lunch, and snacks. The Amazon Fresh stores are more like regular grocery stores that provides produce, ready-made dinners, and household essentials. Some Amazon Go stores also stock local and regional favorite products to cater to the preferences of the community, as well as Amazon-branded ...

t: Amazon's Just Walk Out technology relies on hundreds of workers in India watching you shop
s: April 3, 2024 - Amazon promoted Just Walk Out as AI-powered cashierless technology. But the tech reportedly relied on workers in India for accuracy.

t: Amazon launches new Amazon Saver private label to help shoppers save, take on Walmart, Target - ABC News
s: September 11, 2024 - Amazon announced a new private-label brand, Amazon Saver, for what the company said will be more affordable groceries.

t: Inside Amazon's first high-tech Go store in suburbia, where there's more stuff and a made-to-order menu – GeekWire
s: April 26, 2022 - Amazon opened another physical store concept with Just Walk Out called Amazon Go Grocery in February 2020 in Redmond, Wash., a suburb east of Seattle. But it closed that location last year and ditched the Amazon Go Grocery brand.

t: 5 Reasons Why Amazon Go Is Already The Greatest Retail Innovation Of The Next 30 Years
s: October 12, 2022 - Retail innovation cycles every 30 to 40 years. E-commerce was the last great innovation, and Amazon Go is now set to carry the torch.

t: Amazon Fresh grocery store: Meet Just Walk Out shopping
s: June 15, 2021 - For the first time, Just Walk Out shopping is available in a full-size grocery store at the new Amazon Fresh.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
